channel.title: Posts on Blog, Thoughts, and Interesting Links
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Blog, Thoughts, and Interesting Links

item.title: Staying Focused
item.description: I don’t know if its a mix of imposter syndrome, so many ideas i dont know where to start, the worry of being “job interview ready” at any point, or what, but often i find myself overwhelmed and unsure of where to go next, what project i should be working on, what framework i should be learning… The world of computer science/programming/coding/etc. is so exciting and growing every day. So many talented engineers are off creating new things, improving on old concepts and making things faster/more efficient.

item.title: Bitwise Operators in Python
item.description: These are my notes from learning about bitwise operators & : AND Copies bit if it exists in both | : OR Copies bit if it exists in either ^ : XOR Copies bit if it exists in one but not the other ~ : One's Compliment Flip bits << : Left Shift move left operand left by right operand number of bits >> : Right Shift move left operand right by right operand number of bits Examples were easy to understand from a textual definition, but to see a visual, i wrote the following python code to show the binary versions.
